description.narrative: The project will strengthen the hospital sector in Ulaanbaatar and improve drug safety nationwide. It complements previous Asian Development Bank (ADB) development initiatives in the health sector in Mongolia.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Health (formerly Ministry of Health and Sports)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least 50% reduction of the number of illegal, counterfeit, substandard, or not quality-assured drugs on the market in 2016 from 26% in 2007

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety

title.narrative: A transparent public reporting system on hospital performances and drug safety is in place

title.narrative: Road map to establish 10 additional general hospitals by 2020 approved by 2016
